main.name: Cameron Jude Luyt
main.bio: I am a hard working individual with the capacity to accomplish any task through my creative problem-solving abilities. I have a lifelong passion for technology and am always eager and motivated to broaden my knowledge. I aim to be a productive and efficient team member with the ability to lead as well. My main goal is to become a full-stack developer.

education.description: A bootcamp which simulates a work experience. During my time here I learned the following coding languages HTML, CSS, JavaScript, ReactJS, Python and MongoDB. I was also exposed to personal and professional development.
There are three words that describes Mondale High and its students. Discipline, Dedication and Determination.

work.title: Score-Keeper
work.description: Kept track of the score, did match reports after each game and organised drinks after each game.

projects.title: User Profile System
projects.category: A site that stores user information in the form of card panels and models. Users are removable. This project was built with HTML, CSS and Bootstrap.

projects.title: IT-Logger
projects.category: A site that stores technicians along with tasks they're required to complete and tasks they've completed. This project was created using HTML, CSS, React and more

projects.title: GitHub Finder
projects.category: A site that fetches GitHub user information. The site displays information such as user profile picture, followers and following, number of repos and gists, a link to the users profile and more. This project was built using HTML, CSS, React and more

projects.title: Contact-Keeper
projects.category: A site that allows users to create personal/professional accounts. With these accounts users are able to store and manage contacts. This project was built with HTML, CSS, React, MongoDB and more

projects.title: AZ-TECH
projects.category: A site that enables users to shop online for items tech related. This site includes features such as a user login system, inventory management, order management, shopping cart system, reviews and more. This project was built using HTML, CSS, React, MongoDB and more

projects.title: Cameron Jude Luyt
projects.category: A site the displays my professional information. This site also includes examples of past projects aswell as a downloadable CV. This project was built with HTML, CSS, React and more

testimonials.text: Cameron is a fantastic developer to work with and is a excellent problem-solver. In addition to his pleasant personality, Cameron is co-operative and willing to learn.
testimonials.user: Godwin Dzvapatsva(Head of Curriculum and Learning)

testimonials.text: He produces excellent work, and has a great work ethic, and also a team player
Cameron's a creative thinker and determined individual. He has great potential and will be an asset to any workplace
